title: Synthesis of hydroxyapatite from eggshells via wet chemical precipitation: a review
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,21439-21452
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA02198C, Review Article
Open Access

Zaid Kareem, Ersan Eyiler
In conjunction with the global trend towards sustainable industry, this review provides a summary of the research endeavors and efforts made in the field of exploiting eggshells in the production of hydroxyapatite (HA).
